title: Is 'Natural Immunity' a Valid Exception to Vaccine Mandates?
author: Allen Smith; J D
description: Federal law allows employers to mandate COVID-19 vaccines for employees who've been infected with COVID-19 and those who haven't, and the Biden administration's vaccine-or-testing mandate won't likely create an exception for those with "natural immunity."
